nodes.documentation:
@title RiftPact: OathForge Token Fracturizer
 @author GuildCrypt
nodes.name: RiftPact

nodes.documentation: @dev Emits when an auction is started
nodes.name: AuctionStarted
AuctionCompleted
Bid
Payout

nodes.documentation: @dev Returns the DAI contract address.
nodes.name: daiAddress

nodes.documentation: @dev Returns the OathForge contract address.
nodes.name: oathForgeAddress

nodes.documentation: @dev Returns the OathForge token id. **Does not imply RiftPact has ownership over token.**
nodes.name: oathForgeTokenId

nodes.documentation: @dev Returns the timestamp at which anyone can start an auction by calling [`startAuction()`](#startAuction())
nodes.name: auctionAllowedAt

nodes.documentation: @dev Returns the minimum bid in attoDAI (10^-18 DAI).
nodes.name: minBid

nodes.documentation: @dev Returns the timestamp at which an auction was started or 0 if no auction has been started
nodes.name: auctionStartedAt

nodes.documentation: @dev Returns the timestamp at which an auction was completed or 0 if no auction has been completed
nodes.name: auctionCompletedAt

nodes.documentation: @dev Returns the top bid or 0 if no bids have been placed
nodes.name: topBid

nodes.documentation: @dev Returns the top bidder or `address(0)` if no bids have been placed
nodes.name: topBidder

nodes.documentation: @dev Start an auction
nodes.name: startAuction

nodes.documentation:
@dev Submit a bid. Must have sufficient funds approved in `DAI` contract (bid * totalSupply).
 @param bid Bid in attoDAI (10^-18 DAI)
nodes.name: submitBid

nodes.documentation: @dev Complete auction
nodes.name: completeAuction

nodes.documentation: @dev Payout `dai` after auction completed
nodes.name: payout
